whatIsService.title: What Is Chemical Peel Treatment?
whatIsService.content:
A chemical peel is a professional skin resurfacing treatment that uses carefully selected acids to remove damaged outer layers of skin, revealing fresher, smoother, and more radiant skin underneath.

Whether you're dealing with acne scars, sun damage, fine lines, uneven texture, or dull skin, chemical peels offer a safe and effective solution to transform your complexion.

At The Skin Firm, we offer various types of chemical peels from gentle superficial peels for maintenance to deeper peels for significant skin concerns. Under the expert care of Dr. Karishma Singh, each treatment is customized to your skin type and specific needs.

postCare.title: Post-Care After Chemical Peel Treatment
postCare.description: Following proper post-care instructions is crucial for optimal results and to prevent complications. The recovery process varies depending on the depth of the peel.

downtime.title: Downtime After Chemical Peel
items: Light Peels - minimal downtime, mild redness for 1-2 days
Medium Peels - 3-7 days of peeling and redness
Skin Sensitivity - temporary increased sensitivity to sun and products
Peeling Process - natural shedding of treated skin layers

tips: Keep skin moisturized with gentle, fragrance-free products
Avoid picking or peeling the skin manually
Use gentle cleansers and avoid harsh scrubbing
Stay hydrated and follow prescribed skincare routine

faqs.title: FAQs on Chemical Peel Treatment in Pune

questions.question: How soon will I see results from chemical peel treatment?
questions.answer: Results are typically visible within 1-2 weeks after the peeling process is complete. For optimal results, a series of 3-6 peels may be recommended, spaced 2-4 weeks apart.

questions.question: Is chemical peel treatment painful?
questions.answer: Most patients experience mild stinging or burning during the peel application, which subsides quickly. We ensure your comfort throughout the procedure.

questions.question: Can I wear makeup after a chemical peel?
questions.answer: It's best to avoid makeup for 24-48 hours after a light peel and longer for deeper peels. We'll provide specific guidelines based on your treatment.

questions.question: Are chemical peels safe for all skin types?
questions.answer: Chemical peels can be safely performed on most skin types when properly assessed and customized. We carefully evaluate your skin before recommending treatment.

questions.question: How often can I get chemical peels?
questions.answer: Light peels can be done every 2-4 weeks, while medium peels are typically spaced 3-6 months apart. Your treatment schedule will be customized based on your skin's needs and response.
